title: Northern Territory Bush Getaway Near Kakadu National Park
description: Experience the rugged beauty of the Northern Territory along the banks of the lush Mary River wetlands. Located halfway between Darwin and Kakadu National Park, Mary River Wilderness Retreat is the perfect launching pad to discover the vibrant wildlife, wetlands and spiritual heartland of Australia. Your Top End getaway features a continental breakfast for two, one-time, two-hour for the price of one-hour boat hire and a complimentary glass of wine or beer when you purchase a main meal at Gecko Restaurant.
